about.name: Nathalie Rautell
about.description: You either find me typing on a keyboard or at the gym somewhere between the weights. So basically I'm always building something, if not websites and applications then physical strength. My love for code goes way back, and after years apart weâ€™re now finally living happily ever after. However I'm still in the process of deciding which programming language is my favorite. I'm a bit indecisive. But currently I'm enjoying JavaScript, or more exact React.js.

skills.skillmessage: A short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

featured.title: Movie app
featured.description: Multi-page React.js application showing data from themoviedb.org's API. The shown data is fetched from different API urls, the chosen url is based on to the user interaction.

featured.title: Happy thoughts app
featured.description: React.js Twitter-like application used for fetching and posting data to an API. Used to post and like short messages.

featured.title: RSVP app
featured.description: Multi-step form built with React.js for RSVP where each question is shown in its own section and a progress bar is shown.

featured.title: Music release App
featured.description: One-page React.js application showing data from Spotify's API. The application shows new music releases and popular playlists.

featured.title: Weather app
featured.description: Weather application showing data fetched from Open Weather Map's API. The application is showing current weather and a five day forecast based on the user's current location. The application also has a darkmode depending on the current time and other CSS animations.

featured.title: Pizza bot
featured.description: Pizza application built with html, css and javascript. Depending on user input it displays an order confirmation with calculated price and time in a modal box.

other.title: Cluedo game generator
other.description: Cluedo generator showing the user a randomized chosen weapon, suspect and room in a modal box. CSS animations is also implemented.

other.title: Business site
other.description: A business site with main focus the functionality and the design for a hero video, an accordian and a sign up form.

other.title: News site
other.description: A newspaper site with focus on responsive design, CSS flexbox and CSS grid.

posts.title: Why coding is just like bodybuilding
posts.description: At first, you might not draw a parallel between these two at all. Before getting confused, let me explain that there's a relationship between bodybuilding and programming. There's a lot more to it than you may think!
